name: Omni HR
description:
Omni is an HR tech company headquartered in Singapore and with a global footprint. We are a team of experienced HR professionals and passionate technologists who are committed to creating the next-generation employee management platform.
 We take pride in our product and the value we create for our customers. We are constantly seeking improvements and aspire to be the HR software partner that grows together with our customers!
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Automate all your HR processes in a single system
ShortDescription: Omni frees HR teams from administrative tasks by automating the end-to-end employee lifecycle

Highlights.name: Customer support that truly cares
Highlights.description: Our team goes the extra mile to get you solutions for whatever you need.

Highlights.name: Modern, easy to use
Highlights.description: Our intuitive and modern interface ensures that your team get used to the platform in no time.

Highlights.name: Secure
Highlights.description: Omni HR, ISO 27001 certified, ensures maximum employee data protection with end-to-end encryption.

enhanced_description: Omni HR is an HR technology platform headquartered in Singapore with a global footprint, committed to creating a next-generation employee management solution. It aims to automate end-to-end HR processes in a single system, freeing HR teams from administrative tasks and boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity. Omni HR achieves significant efficiency gains, including a 96% reduction in admin tasks, 70% time saved with automation, and 6x faster onboarding. The platform supports core HR functions such as HRIS, HCM, HRMS, recruiting, job boards, and onboarding. It features a modern, easy-to-use interface, dedicated customer support, and robust security measures, being ISO 27001 certified with end-to-end encryption for maximum employee data protection.
key_use_cases: Streamlining and accelerating the onboarding process
Improving hiring manager productivity and confidence
Managing core HR data and processes (HRIS/HRMS/HCM)
competitive_advantages: Comprehensive automation of HR processes in a single system
Significant reduction in HR administrative tasks (up to 96%)
Substantial time savings through automation (up to 70%)
High level of data security (ISO 27001 certified, end-to-end encryption)
roi_benefits: 70% time savings for HR teams through automation
Increased HR team efficiency and productivity
Improved hiring manager productivity and confidence
Cost savings from reduced manual effort
scalability_features: Scalable to support various company sizes (Small, Large, Global Enterprise)
Designed to grow with customer needs
